title: Add Contact Us item to header navigation

requirements.summary: Add a localized "Contact Us" nav item in the header for both desktop and mobile that navigates to the existing /contact route using i18n key nav.contact.
acceptanceCriteria: The header navbar shows a "Contact Us" item in the desktop navigation.
The mobile (sheet) navigation also includes a "Contact Us" item.
Clicking/tapping the "Contact Us" item navigates to the existing route "/contact" and renders the existing ContactUs page.
The nav item label is sourced from i18n using the existing key "nav.contact" (do not hardcode the string).

file_operations.description: Update the header navItems list to include a new entry { label: t('nav.contact'), path: '/contact' } so it renders in both the desktop nav and the mobile Sheet menu; keep using the existing shadcn-ui Button/Sheet components already used by the header for consistent behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
